outputFolder.description: The folder to output the generated documentation to. Relative to the current working directory.

base.description: The base path to deploy to.

title.description: The title of the documentation. it will appear in the header of the documentation.

logo.description: The logo to display in the header of the documentation.

apis.description: The APIs to generate documentation for.

customPagesFolder.description: The folder containing custom pages to include in the documentation. Relative to this configuration file.

examplesFolder.description: The folder containing example requests and responses to include in the documentation. Relative to this configuration file.

groups.description: The groups to use to categorize the APIs.

id.description: A unique identifier for the API. This is used to generate unique URLs for the types and operations.

name.description: The name of the API as it should appear in the documentation.

inferGroups.description: Whether to infer groups from the API specification. Currently groups can be inferred  from OpenAPI 3.0 using the tags defined in the specification.

url.description: The URL of the API specification (OpenAPI 3.0 or GraphGL schema) to generate documentation for.It can be a local file path (absolute or relative to this configuration file) or a URL. For GraphQL schemas, the URL may point to the introspection query result or to the schema itself.

API.title: API
API.description: An API to generate documentation for.

name.description: The name of the group as it should appear in the documentation.

regex.description: A regular expression to match the type or operation names. Matching types or operations will be assigned to this group.

Logo.description: The logo to display in the header of the documentation.

url.description: The URL of the logo image. It can be a local file path (absolute or relative to this configuration file) or a URL.

width.description: The width of the logo image in pixels.

height.description: The height of the logo image in pixels.

alt.description: The alt text for the logo image.

Logo.title: Logo
